column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Andy - Thank you for your review. We regret that you did not fully enjoy our fare. Please know that if you ever have any issue whatsoever with our food
column2: just tell your server and he or she will be happy to remake it until it meets your satisfaction. Or we will happily replace it with something else or remove any items from your tab. We appreciate your visit
column3: and thank you for your feedback.
